Package hu.klenium.tetris.view

Class BoardView

  • java.lang.Object
    • hu.klenium.tetris.view.CanvasView
      • hu.klenium.tetris.view.BoardView
  • public class BoardView
extends CanvasView
    View of the board's data: when it's updated, this view displays it again.
    Currently it draws only each cells, but this class can be used to add more decorations.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class hu.klenium.tetris.view.CanvasView

    • Constructor Detail

      • BoardView

        public BoardView​(GameFrame frame,
                 int squareSize)
        Sets up the view. The parameters are used to pass needed data that will be used later.
        Parameters:
        frame - The game frame which this board is connected to. It is used to access Canvas#board, the board's drawing surface.
        squareSize - Size of cells.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update​(BoardCell[][] board)
        Displays the board's data again.
        Parameters:
        board - The table of the board's cells those will be drawn.
